sentences.english: And the children of Amram； Aaron， and Moses， and Miriam.
sentences.chinese: 暗蘭的兒子是亞倫，摩西，還有女兒米利暗。

sentences.english: He slaughtered the ox and the ram as the fellowship offering for the people.
sentences.chinese: 亞倫宰了那給百姓作平安祭的公牛和公綿羊。

sentences.english: and Moses and Aaron and his sons used it to wash their hands and feet.
sentences.chinese: 摩西和亞倫並亞倫的兒子，在這盆裏洗手洗腳。

sentences.english: and Moses and Aaron and his sons used it to wash their hands and feet.
sentences.chinese: 摩西和亞倫並亞倫的兒子，在這盆裏洗手洗腳。

sentences.english: All the Israelites railed against Moses and Aaron.
sentences.chinese: 所有猶太人開始指責摩西和亞倫。

sentences.english: Bring the tribe of Levi and present them to Aaron the priest to assist him.
sentences.chinese: 你使利未支派近前來，站在祭司亞倫面前好服事他。

sentences.english: So the Levites made preparations for themselves and for the Aaronic priests.
sentences.chinese: 所以利未人爲自己和祭司亞倫的子孫，預備祭物。

sentences.english: She was the mother of Miriam, Aaron and Moses.
sentences.chinese: 她是米利安，亞倫和摩西的母親。

sentences.english: All the towns for the priests, the descendants of Aaron, were thirteen, together with their pasturelands.
sentences.chinese: 亞倫子孫作祭司的共有十三座城，還有屬城的郊野。

sentences.english: When Aaron and all the Israelites saw Moses, hisface was radiant, and they were afraid to come near him.
sentences.chinese: 亞倫和以色列衆人看見摩西的麪皮發光就怕挨近他。

sentences.english: They envied Moses also in the camp, and Aaron the saint of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 他們又在營中嫉妒摩西，和耶和華的聖者亞倫。

sentences.english: Make sacred garments for your brother Aaron, to give him dignity and honor.
sentences.chinese: 你要給你哥哥亞倫作聖衣爲榮耀，爲華美。

sentences.english: He poured some of the anointing oil on Aaron's head and anointed him to consecrate him.
sentences.chinese: 又把膏油倒在亞倫的頭上膏他，使他成聖。

sentences.english: Aaron Cypess of Joslin Diabetes Center in Boston, an author of one of the new studies.
sentences.chinese: 亞倫博士是這項新的研究的研究者之一。

sentences.english: Bring Aaron and his sons to the entrance to the Tent of Meeting and wash them with water.
sentences.chinese: 要使亞倫和他兒子到會幕門口來，用水洗身。

sentences.english: The Packers' coach has said Aaron Rodgers will be the starter.
sentences.chinese: 綠灣隊的教練表示亞倫羅傑斯將擔任先發球員。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
tabernacle (biblical word for a meeting hall or tent)
Book of Genesis/First Book of Moses
variant of 曉喻|晓喻[xiao3 yu4]
